title: Taking a while to be able to lock in
body:
Whenever I'm in champion select and go to pick/ban, the lock in button grays out for a bit then goes to normal. It's not much of a big problem, but in one occasion, i was in ranked champion select then the lock in button straight up froze and didn't let me log in, causing me to get leaverbuster. :/ 
Is there a fix to this? I've also noticed my client sometimes losing connection for a few seconds when in the home screen or post-game menu.

replies.body:
If you've noticed that you lose your connection every once and awhile, there's a good chance that it's the unstable connection causing the lock in button to gray out. Without a stable connection, the client may not let you press certain buttons because it won't be able to send that button click to our servers.

Let's go over our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get you set up with a more stable connection.
